description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas in pursuant to condition 5 of planning application reference: 192874FUL dated 01.06.2022 for the; Conversion of a single dwellinghouse into five self-contained residential units (1 x 3 bed, 2 x 2 bed, 2 x studio); three storey side/rear extension and part single storey rear extension (following demolition of integral garage); associated internal and external alteration involving alterations to roof; and provision of parking space, bicycle and refuse storage, and amenity space.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
